tp:treatment-sec.p: Typically, males with narrow quarter moon-like, apically bifid Ch-Apo, ~2.4 times as high as wide, with wide, inconspicuous apical pinnacle posteriorly, and Pa-Fe ~ intermediate between both subspecies.
